data.text: Dawuda xa bɛɛti a naxan sɛbɛ Ala xa hɔrɔmɔbanxi xa fe ra
N Marigi Alatala, n to i xili,
Alatala, i naxa n nii rakisi saya ma,
Danxaniyatɔɛe, wo xa bɛɛti ba Alatala bɛ,
N bɔɲɛsa sɔtɔ tɛmui naxɛ n naxa a fala,
Alatala, tɛmui dangixi i naxa n sɛnbɛ lu alɔ geya,
Alatala, n naxa i xili, n naxa i maxandi.
N naxa a fala i bɛ,
Alatala, i tuli mati n na, i xa kinikini n ma.
I bara n ma nimisɛ masara sɛɛwɛ ra.
N Marigi Alatala, na na a ra n mu dunduma,
